notes: Stacks with all other sources of flat health regeneration, except with Regeneration Aura from multiple Headdresses.
Can regenerate up to 120 health in one minute.
Does not affect wards, buildings and invulnerable units.
The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.name: Regeneration Aura

description: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
trivia: In DotA, Headdress was known as Headdress of Rejuvenation.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 45 health, 0.25 health regen, 0.2% magic resistance, 0.32 armor, 2 attack speed, 0.1% movement speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen, 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 36 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.16% magic resistance, 0.4 armor, 2.5 attack speed, 0.13% movement speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen, 0.14% spell damage and 2 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 36 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.16% magic resistance, 0.32 armor, 2 attack speed, 0.1% movement speed, 30 mana, 0.13 mana regen, 0.18% spell damage and 2 attack damage.
